title: PiWeb import plug-in manifest localization schema
description: Describes the localization file for a PiWeb import plug-in manifest.

translation.description: The list of localizations for the plug-in.

title.description: The localization for the plug-in title.

description.description: The localization for the plug-in description.

homepage.description: The localization for the plug-in homepage. This can be used to provide language specific URLs if necessary.

contact.description: The localization for the plug-in contact.

documentation.description: The localization for the plug-in documentation.

provides.displayName.description: The localization for the display name of the provided import automation or import format.

provides.summary.description: The localization for the summary of the provided import automation.
